attributes.action: Parliament to respect the 2016 Referendum result to leave, even with no deal.
attributes.background: Parliament and the media have not supported the 2016 referendum result as they all think they know better than the public. This is why the EU has laughed at the UK negotiators for the last 3 years. We elected you, you asked us what we wanted and we shocked you and told you "We want to leave the EU".
